channel.title: Ribenji
channel.description: Ok well this is first server i ever worked on its Czar i barely take any credits for this as its not fully updated version and i didnt do to much to it well anyways its actually really stable for being czar i mean i was holding 50 players no lag. features include fully working ip ban if get flooded it will actually stop them as long as you can execute this command i do not take creds for this it goes to Ploxage new home starting place at the freminik town added some new items into shops ::alert ( pretty much announcement) all those little fun commands like setsay and gay lol not sure if in this version but i had skillcapes emotes added... jail command (do not take credit) illegal symbols block ( its easy i know but still some people dont have it) well i could put more but i dont feel the need to no virus scan! [IMG]http://i245.photobucket.com/albums/gg48/billy114911/start.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i245.photobucket.com/albums/gg48/billy114911/Thief.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i245.photobucket.com/albums/gg48/billy114911/stores1.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i245.photobucket.com/albums/gg48/billy114911/stores.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i245.photobucket.com/albums/gg48/billy114911/barrows.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i245.photobucket.com/albums/gg48/billy114911/BandosSpec.jpg[/img] so heres the link [url=http://rapidshare.com/files/156182316/Ribenji.rar.html]http://rapidshare.com/files/156182316/Ribenji.rar.html[/url] also Ribenji means Revenge in Japanese and i forgot to delete members list ^^

Ok well this is first server i ever worked on its Czar i barely take any credits for this as its not fully updated version and i didnt do to much to it well anyways its actually really stable for being czar i mean i was holding 50 players no lag.
features include
fully working ip ban if get flooded it will actually stop them as long as you can execute this command i do not take creds for this it goes to Ploxage
new home starting place at the freminik town
added some new items into shops
::alert ( pretty much announcement)
all those little fun commands like setsay and gay lol
not sure if in this version but i had skillcapes emotes added…
jail command (do not take credit)
illegal symbols block ( its easy i know but still some people dont have it)
well i could put more but i dont feel the need to no virus scan!
